reviews.review_msg: Ok.i had math 154 with him. he isn't the sort of a teacher that would repeat alot,so if u wanna follow him,u better do pre-lecture readings or if u have taken calc in highschool it will help u heck of a lottt.i passed this course with A+ and was the 2nd highest mark in class. my experience tells u: DO THE HOMEWORK+ALWAYS TAKE UR PROBLEMS TO THE LAB
